title: Herbert Hoover National Historic Site: Education
body: "Truly every generation discovers the world all new again and knows it can improve it." - Herbert Hoover Herbert Hoover National Historic Site and the Herbert Hoover Presidential Library and Museum are classrooms full of lessons on Herbert Hoover's career, family, and community. Field trips, curriculum materials, professional development opportunities, and suggested reading can help teachers and their classes make Herbert Hoover National Historic Site an extension of their classrooms. Read More                 Plan A Field Trip Kids can visit historic buildings and learn about Herbert Hoover with a park ranger during field trips. Read More        Know Your History Learn more about Herbert Hoover and be prepared for the classroom with a suggested reading list. Read More        Curriculum Materials Free activity guides help with classroom instruction or to prepare for a class field trip. Read More
